RelatedSentence: When gastrointestinal problems complicated her ailments , Tufts ' doctors referred her to Boston Children 's Hospital .

Justina 's parents immediately rejected the new psychiatric diagnosis and let their grievances be known to the Boston Children 's Hospital personnel .
